\subsection{Detailed Description}
Read the pattern of a file stored in Harwell-\/\-Boeing format. This module implements the routines to read the pattern of a file stored in Harwell-\/\-Boeing format. Modified from the H\-B format loader routines written by Sam Williams $<$\href{mailto:swwilliams@lbl.gov}{\tt swwilliams@lbl.\-gov}$>$.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
Called by \hyperlink{poski__LoadMatrixHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Load\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c}
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__LoadMatrix__common_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Load\-Matrix\-\_\-common.\-c}
